justification: Asks Team B to surrender exactly what they value (a workhorse RB and vetted WR) for an injured boom/bust WR and a volatile depth RB, despite B’s urgent need for weekly floor. Minimal evidence of modeling B’s contrarian, volume-first mindset. The rationale is generic and contradictory (“Garcia’s workload fits B’s floor needs” while taking Garcia away). Contextually lopsided and misaligned with both teams’ profiles, especially B’s win-now constraint.
